ygData.subject: Re: Yellow?!?
ygData.msgSnippet: Nother trick is that no drop items can be given to MOBs due to quests.. so wait until you see a easy kill around and hand it to the monster then kill it. let
ygData.messageBody:
Nother trick is that no drop items can be given to MOBs due to quests.. so
wait until you see a easy kill around and hand it to the monster then kill
it. let the appropriate member loot it.
Mythlon Bladesinger, The Young One
----- Original Message -----
From: CYR, Thierry <tcyr@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 6:53 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Yellow?!?


> From: "CYR, Thierry" <tcyr@...>
>
> well... there is one way around no drop. If someone in your party loots
> something that they cant use but you can, duel them for it, tell them to
let
> you win, you can loot the item from their corpse afterwards. and they dont
> lose xp because its a duel
>
> Minkin
> P.S. But if there is not much trust in the person that loots it or wants
it,
> then letting another loot you/him might be a tough one to pull off
>
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: John Kim [SMTP:kim@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 6:51 PM
> > To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Yellow?!?
> >
> > From: John Kim <kim@...>
> >
> > On Thu, 29 Jul 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
> > >
> > > Also the Fear Plane armor is almost all No Drop, so no auctions hehe.
> >
> > I guess you'd better be careful when looting then. Have to be
> > sure to check who can use the armor before looting it. And if
> > there's nobody of that class in your group, might as well
> > destroy it. :-(
> >
> > --
> > John H. Kim
> > kim@...
> >
